competition_summary.context: competition for such services among EOG and other companies in its industry; (iv) labor shortages; and (v) other factors, including the ongoing conflict between Russia and the Ukraine which began in late February 2022.  EOG currently expects such inflationary pressures and contributing factors to continue in 2023.
